thread.title: Ground News - Single parents turn to house sharing amid surging cost of living
thread.title_full: Ground News - Single parents turn to house sharing amid surging cost of living

author: 9News
title: Ground News - Single parents turn to house sharing amid surging cost of living
text: When single mum-of-two Michelle separated from her partner, she knew she wanted to keep her own home on Sydney's northern beaches.With a newborn baby and a five-year-old, she also knew she didn't want to have to work crazy hours away from her children to be able to afford to do so."I didn't want to be leaving for work at 6.30-7 o'clock in the morning and coming home at 6.30 or 7 o'clock at night," she said."That would mean long days for the kids… Summary by 9News 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] 9News When single mum-of-two Michelle separated from her partner, she knew she wanted to keep her own home on Sydney's northern beaches.With a newborn baby and a five-year-old, she also knew she didn't want to have to work crazy hours away from her children to be able to afford to do so."I didn't want to be leaving for work at 6.30-7 o'clock in the morning and coming home at 6.30 or 7 o'clock at night," she said."That would mean long days for the kids… 4 hours ago·AustraliaRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
